content: Thank you for a story well-told, for we all have stories. The title has a word in it that I hate — SHOULD. I have been ‘should on’ all my life. Getting out from under someone else’s idea of what yet Someone else wants in my life has been incredibly freeing. Now I get involved with my heart leading. I would only put the word DO in place of SHOULD. I have far to go, but first for me was to have my heart broken by the very nature of my needs, which are EXACTLY the needs of everyone on this planet.
